## About this site

This website was created by [Eli Pousson](https://elipousson.github.io/) for the Fall 2022 course *Building Spatial Datasets* at the University of Maryland Baltimore County, [Department of Geography & Environmental Systems (GES)](https://ges.umbc.edu). This website. The site includes the course syllabus, a schedule of readings, assignments, examples, and resources.
